Class LibraryManager

java.lang.Object
LibraryManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<LibraryItem>
public class LibraryManager extends Object implements Iterable<LibraryItem>, Serializable
LibraryManager manages a collection of library items (books, CDs, etc.). It provides functionality to add items, retrieve items by various criteria, and persist/restore the collection to/from disk. The class implements Iterable to allow iteration over all items in the collection and Serializable to allow the collection to be saved to and loaded from disk.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • LibraryManager

      public LibraryManager()
      Constructor to initialize an empty LibraryManager. Creates a HashMap with an initial capacity of 500 and load factor of 0.6.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(LibraryItem theBook)
      Adds a library item to the collection using its catalog number as the key. If an item with the same catalog number already exists, it will be replaced.
      Parameters:
      theBook - the LibraryItem to add to the collection

    • getAll

      public ArrayList<LibraryItem> getAll()
      Returns a sorted ArrayList of all library items in the collection. The items are sorted alphabetically by title.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all LibraryItems sorted by title

    • getByCatalogNum

      public LibraryItem getByCatalogNum(String catalogNum)
      Retrieves a library item from the collection by its catalog number.
      Parameters:
      catalogNum - the catalog number of the item to retrieve
      Returns:
      the LibraryItem with the specified catalog number, or null if not found

    • getByYear

      public ArrayList<LibraryItem> getByYear(int year)
      Returns a sorted ArrayList of all library items from the specified year. The items are sorted alphabetically by title.
      Parameters:
      year - the year to filter by
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of LibraryItems from the specified year, sorted by title

    • getCheckedOut

      public ArrayList<LibraryItem> getCheckedOut()
      Returns a sorted ArrayList of all library items that are currently checked out. The items are sorted alphabetically by title.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all checked-out LibraryItems, sorted by title

    • getCount

      public int getCount()
      Returns the total number of items in the collection.
      Returns:
      the count of all LibraryItems in the collection

    • iterator

      public Iterator<LibraryItem> iterator()
      Returns an iterator over the library items in the collection. This is required by the Iterable interface.
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Iterable<LibraryItem>
      Returns:
      an Iterator over LibraryItems in the collection

    • load

      public void load()
      Deserializes the library item collection from the file "library-items.ser" on disk. If the load operation fails, an error message is printed to the console.

    • save

      public void save()
      Serializes the library item collection to the file "library-items.ser" on disk. If the save operation fails, an error message is printed to the console.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of all library items in the collection. Each item is displayed on a separate line, sorted alphabetically by title.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of all items in the collection
